entry.title: Hundreds of Palestinians Evacuate Gaza's Largest Hospital as Israel Tightens Control
entry.content: At least 450 patients from Gaza City’s besieged Al-Shifa Hospital, some in wheelchairs, began moving toward the enclave’s south.

entry.title: How Architect of Argentina's Grim Economy Is Boosting His Presidential Bid
entry.content: In Sunday’s election, populist Peronists bet on neighborhood operatives to rally poor voters as high inflation takes a toll.

entry.title: Israel-Hamas War Puts Palestinians Back on Arab World's Agenda
entry.content: Israel’s fierce response to Hamas’s cross-border assault has reinvigorated support for Palestinians in the Arab world and stirred popular anger—not just at Israel and the U.S., but also at Arab governments.
